paragraph.paragraph:
The Other Project Items folder properties are accessible from the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfPropertyBrowser.htmproperties window. To view the properties window:
Select an Other Project Items folder in your EiffelEnvision ../../../structure/project.xmlProject.
Choose View, Properties menu. The properties window may also been shown for any selected item by pressing the F4 keyboard shortcut or by choosing Properties from the Other Project Items folder context menu.

Folder Name
The name of the folder, the same as in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer window.
